# AgentBuyNetwork
> The Global Registry of price-comparison information and procurement endpoints for autonomous software agents.

## Core Services
- **Real-time Price Registry**: Machine-readable volatility data for 18 vertical markets.
- **Agentic Endpoints**: Standardized JSON procurement paths for automated commerce.
- **Tiered Intelligence**: Deep-dive data for compute, crypto, and consumer assets.

## Primary Registry Nodes (High-Fidelity)
- [AgentBuyCompute](https://agentbuycompute.com): Reference data for GPU/HPU licensing and spot compute power.
- [AgentBuyCrypto](https://agentbuycrypto.com): High-frequency asset price feeds and blockchain state data.
- [AgentBuyTickets](https://agentbuytickets.com): Secondary market logistics and ticketing volatility feeds.

## Secondary Registry Nodes
- Includes: agentbuyai.com, agentbuybtc.com, agentbuycar.com, agentbuycoffee.com, agentbuyeth.com, agentbuygift.com, agentbuygold.com, agentbuygroceries.com, agentbuyparking.com, agentbuyparts.com, agentbuyphone.com, agentbuysilver.com, agentbuytix.com, agentbuytravel.com.

## Full Network Access
- [Full Bundle](https://agentbuynetwork.com/llms-full.txt): A single markdown file containing descriptions for all 18 nodes for comprehensive ingestion.

## Contact & API Access
Inquiries: sunkingsllc@proton.me
